Paid for both types of activities: project and non-project, i.e., it will be paid no matter if you are assigned to a project or not.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Fixed project compensation\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It’s a monthly fee that remains stable from project to project, and it’s paid proportionally to the monthly workload on a project, i.e., for project activities only.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Project-specific pay\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It’s an extra monthly payment to be agreed upon for each project, specifically before assignment for the whole project duration. It is paid proportionally to the monthly workload on this exact project, i.e., for project activities only.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Compensation is paid monthly and \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"consists of one payment:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table\",\"data\":{\"cellSizes\":[223,803]},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1st pay\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Base pay: \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"on the 7th day of the month following the month of cooperation*\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Fixed project compensation:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"100% -
